channel.title: Technology on Favorite Quotes
channel.description: Recent content in Technology on Favorite Quotes

item.title: Successful Technology
item.description: For a successful technology, reality must take precedence over public relations, for nature cannot be fooled. – Richard Feynman (“Rogers Commission Report”, 1986)

item.title: The Greatest Obstacle To Discovery
item.description: The greatest obstacle to discovery is not ignorance – it is the illusion of knowledge. – Daniel J. Boorstin

item.title: This Is Our Day
item.description: I believe that God has opened up these treasures of intelligence [technology] to enhance his purposes on the earth. – James E. Faust (source)
